input.sentences: [female] was upset that [female] and [female] were keeping secrets .
`` i just ca n't tell you ! '' [female] said .
`` [female] we promised someone we would n't ! '' [female] bellowed .
[female] even sat down looking sadly at [female] .
[female] said she was fine with it and they all decided to have a party together .
output.sentences: In an apartment, a woman opened a magazine and was disturbed by what she saw.
As her friend listened to what she described, she too was overcome by nausea.
A third friend joked about the image, saying it reminded her of the good old days.
They contemplated their past as the night went on, sharing stories of the old days.
Taking a photo together, the group prepared to say goodnight.
